评论概述: Pretty out of package but bad quality as you wear it!
评论详情: I should have read the reviews and trusted them more! This jacket was not cheap but the quality sure was. I'd like to have a refund as this jacket is pretty much no good to me anymore. I wanted to use this jacket as more of a casual going out-to-dinner type of jacket where it was still flattering, however, I would not choose it again as it looks so rugged and picked apart. It fits true to size and looks good out of the package, but just don't wear it often or at all if you want it to look good. I was excited as this would be a free people dupe, but I was saddened with this quality.

This jacket checks all the boxes for me. Comfortable, roomy, flattering, everything. Order your normal size. Just perfect!!  I have large breasts, I have a hard time finding the right jacket to fit right and still cover the girls.
I love the brand Blank NYC, I always know their clothes will be good quality. The color and fit of this jacket are perfect. It really elevates an outfit

评论概述: Jacket looks used right out of the packaging.

评论概述: Room in Arms - Body portion is NOT bulky
评论详情: Love this jacket. Not to heavy, not to thick over the body, bottom part compliments the figure. Hope more colors come back in stock, I will get a third one in black if possible. My arms are my problem area, Dolman sleeves are my solution. I usually wear a small but if you have hips it might be a bit snug at the bottom. With a regular top I’m okay. I got another color is a medium for over winter items.
Love it, true to fit.
This jacket is warm, comfy and stylish. Love everything about it.
So stylish and cute! Good price too!

评论概述: Did anyone else's jacket pill - but it was the lining coming out?
评论详情: First off let me say I LOVED this jacket. Ordered it in Chai and love the color, fit, style and texture - super soft and in all those ways, it is worth the price for a no-name brand jacket.  BUT after five days wearing, my love story ended when I noticed white pilling under the arms and side of the body. Low and behold when I tried to pull off the pill *yes I know you can shave them*, it began pulling out the LINING of the jacket and didn't stop. (This is a quilted jacket where they've used a thin layer of quilting but no lining between the quilting and the outer layer). I don't know if anyone else experienced this ??? but I'm soo bummed because I love everything else about the jacket!!! Just can't stomach paying $90 (after taxes) for a jacket that has this problem after only a week of wear. Seller - can't find where to message you...is mine defective? I'm returning it :( Sigh.

评论概述: …to see it means to fall in love!
评论详情: This was way more money than I would normally spend on an item like this, but it’s so delicious I will never return it!
I really like this jacket, but I find it pilling white pills all over the front and under arms. It’s comfy and warm.
Very cute, room for a sweater underneath. It’s a little more cropped than I expected.

评论概述: Looks great on model. Bad quality and frumpy in real life
评论详情: I liked how soft the material is, not sure how it would hold up in the long run with washing. I’ve been trying to buy natural fibers for many reasons. I’ve grown to hate polyester having kids clothes that need to be washed often and the feel of over washed polyester, collecting lint, piling, it infuriates me. This coat was made with cotton and polyester. The stuffing possibly was polyester. Anyways—the jacket was wrinkly as all heck, loose green strings just detached in an unreasonably significant amount. I took it off and I was covered in the strings. The stitching is wonky, it would need to be completely wrinkle free to see if it actually fits vs curled and riding up the entire bottom of the coat. I’m disappointed this jacket is as expensive as it is, and the quality is so poor. I’m starting to not trust foreign made items. The description is almost always deceptive, the item falls apart after a few wears. One wash and it’s never the same. Don’t buy this jacket and probably anything the company makes. Do better Amazon with who you’re letting sell items under your name.
Cute jacket, fits true to size. Nice quality, price is a bit high-but I do like it (fabric, style, color). I recommend and would buy again.

Definitely not oversized.  Fits but not like I like my jackets.  I am in the process of loosing weight so fingers crossed it will get more comfortable.  The reason for 4 stars and my decision to keep it is the material is wonderful.  So soft.
Way too Bulky. Normally wear a large and the large  was huge on me!

I think it looks really cute in the picture, but I got a small and it was huge on me.  I know it’s probably supposed to look a little oversized but it was too much and I didn’t put in the effort to return and get an extra small.
This coat fit perfectly, beautiful, rich color and great quality. A bit hard to get the wrinkles out, but managed to.
Jacket is cute but the pilling is so bad. Not what should happen on a $90 jacket.

评论概述: You will definitely need to size down!
评论详情: I bought this jacket for my trip to NC next month in the mountains for those chilly (but not too cold) nights and it’s perfect for that. Keeps me at a comfortable temperature but not too warm. It IS an oversized jacket for sure. I usually wear a size large on top, but downsized to a medium because of the other reviews and I’m glad I did because it’s a perfect fit (still has that “oversized” feel but doesn’t drown you in it). If you are tall like I am, and are worried about the sleeves being too short if you downsize, don’t! The sleeve length is perfect. If you are on the fence about buying this jacket, just do it. You’ll love it just like I do!
The fabric balled up and the inside stuffing was coming through

Way too costly for the quality. I’ve only worn the jacket a handful of times and the inside stuffing is coming/poking out throughout the jacket. It looks similar to pilling except the jacket I bought is green and the filler is white. When you try to pull the “pilling” it creates a snag. See pictures. Extremely disappointed and rather frustrated that I can’t return it.

This jacket looks so good in the pictures I was so excited to get it but in real life the fabric is really thin looks like denim but it’s much thinner softer fabric and it’s very low quality, I kept it because I loved the quilt and the shape but after about three weeks it became ragged and all kind of threads started to came out of it. Not worth the price.
Really cute jacket. Exactly what I was looking for. Delighted I bought it and it arrived really quickly 💯

评论概述: Love this jacket regardless of a few minor complaints.
评论详情: Love this jacket, nice quality although the sleeves are a bit tight on the end. It's quilted so it retains heat and is warm and comfy. Also this is a dupe for the free people quilted jacket for much less, which is awesome.

评论概述: Flattering On Trend Coat Great For Layering
评论详情: Beautiful olive green, on trend, quilted coat. Fit is perfect. I'm a size 12 on bottom but roughly a size 8 up top, so I ordered Medium. I'm curvy, and I usually try to avoid boxy, oversized styles since I think they make me look larger. But this coat is surprisingly flattering. And I have room to put on a nice medium-weight knit sweater underneath for a great layered look without looking stuffed.
